name: Custom Swatches for Iris Color Picker
author: Iceberg Web Design

sections.description: A simple plugin that allows you to customize 8 color swatches underneath the Iris Color Picker. This works for instances of the color picker in themes, plugins, or core. It uses Javascript to send the custom palette to existing Iris objects.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/custom-iris-swatches directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Color Swatches screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/custom-iris-swatches directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Color Swatches screen to configure the plugin

Does this work for the TinyMCE Editor?

Nope, not yet.

Does this work for Divi Builder?

No, however, Divi Builder has it’s own Swatch settings for Iris Color Picker built in!

Does this work for Visual Composer?

Yes!

Does this work for Beaver Builder?

Not yet!
